name: (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧DEIXA ELA PASSAR✧･ﾟ:･ﾟლ(╹ε╹ლ)
description:
“DEIXA ELA PASSAR” (Let her pass) is a compilation of screenshots from a video performance of my debut collection of underwear and also a pre-release of my collection “REALIZE 2021”. For me panties and lingeries are usually something aggressively binary and sexist. So at the beginning of my brand as a black latin transfeminine body that is oppressed by those structures literally don’t fitting on them I wanted to use it as a token to talk about body empowerment, body positivity and also make fun of it. Therefore I created six allegorical panties that represent everything that I could never express, all those repressed feelings expressed as panties. In that day we generate a paties party atmosphere as a celebration and fellowship of our expressions and bodies as queer latin folks and recorded with a handcam. This work represents to me the first step as a single creative director of my own brand and also the importance that doing things collectively with people that I love and care has to me.

TEAM *(`･ω･´)*

models: Gabrielle Gambine, Diana Jesus, Patrick Prodigy Blindex, Uyara Marina, Alysson Blindex, Pedra
video edit/production: Atenna Stella Bovo 
design: Joyce Kiesel
makeup: Güta Helena 
soundtrack: Pujol 
direction: Pedra 
special thanks: Anddy Williams

Compilation edit by Pedra
SONY Handycam HDR-CX405 9.2 megapixels

São Paulo, SP, Brasil, end of 2020.
